rules.description: Caps Lock and Return together mouse middle click
Tab + Return to Backslash on ES Apple board
Change Caps Lock to Control when used as modifier, Escape when used alone
Change Return to Control when used as modifier, Return when used alone
Change Control+I to F6 in Vim
Left and Right Shift together toggle Caps Lock
Change Left Shift to Left Shift when used as modifier, ( when used alone
Change Right Shift to Right Shift when used as modifier, ( when used alone
